mapper.insert: insert into trans_in_application( name, carrier_id, credit_code, registered_capital, address, business, type, register_at, certification, additional_data, status, create_at ) value ( #{name}, #{carrierId}, #{creditCode}, #{registeredCapital}, #{address}, #{business}, #{type}, #{registerAt}, #{certification}, #{additionalData}, #{status}, #{createAt} )

insert into trans_out_application( enterprise_id, carrier_id, trans_out_at, comment, status, additional_data, type, create_at ) value ( #{enterpriseId}, #{carrierId}, #{transOutAt}, #{comment}, #{status}, #{additionalData}, #{type}, #{createAt} )
